name: App Icon Toolkit - iOS/macOS/Android
description:
The ultimate app icon toolkit for iOS, macOS, and Android. You can preview your icon design on your device with provided mockups. Then export icon to correct sizes without any other tools. Let me know if you have any suggestions. You can reach me at twitter @ryanqyao or https://t.me/ryandesign.


Update Apr. 2022:

  1. Update the wallpaper to make the white text easier to see

Update Dec. 2021:

  1. Fix the instruction for exporting on mac

Update Oct. 2021:

  1. Add iOS 15 lock screen notification (Thanks to Joey's iOS 15 kit)
  2. Fix typo
  3. Fix the icon not resizing properly on Android

Update Mar. 2021:

  1. Add macOS preview
